options: ['work every weekend', "work at the kid's home", 'help the kid learn English', 'work eight months a year']
article:
Teachers Wanted
Do you like kids? We need a teacher for our son. He's six years old. We want you to work from March to November, 3 pm. to 6 pm., but you don't need to work in July and August. You can get Y= 30 an hour  . Sometimes we want you to work on weekends, and you can get Y=45 an hour.
You need to:
*Help our son with Chinese.
*Read to him.
*Play with him.
*Go to movies with him.
You need to work at my home. We live in   Taipei Road, next to the Zhongshan Bus Station .
Please call (02)2956-4938. Ask Miss Liu.
